game.name: Panda Commander Air Combat
game.description:
Nothing could be better than flying a plane especially if you are looking forward to become a pilot in future! We have today got you covered with a brand new adventure game where you will get a chance to become a fighter pilot in an air battle. Does not it sound pretty challenging and exciting? Join Panda Commander Air Combat and get ready to fly fantastic jet airplanes in a cool air environment! There are multiple air battles to deal with in this action-packed challenge. 
Tap and hold your finger to navigate the plane! Collect stars and coins to upgrade your weapons to introduce yourself as a powerful fighter! Put your intense fighting abilities and plane flying skills to the test to destroy all your enemies and protect your territory from the invader planes! Your enemies will keep releasing bullets on you. Keep your plane moving forward while avoiding all the dangerous souls available in the sky! You have to fight with the boss at the end of each stage.
Try to save your power until you complete your mission in each level of this html5 war game! Different enemies will try to clear you from the screen by showing their unique power abilities. Plan a strategy to combat against the dangerous ones to complete each stage with the maximum possible score! Track your score and power at the top left corner of the screen! There are 25 unique and challenging levels to play through. Collect stars to upgrade weapons and unlock new stages in this flying adventure! Have a blast without download on atmegame.com!
